Description: Limestone ostracon: on recto and verso respectively five and six lines of administrative texts concerning the distribution of rations to the work-force of Deir el-Medina.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (136387) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/136387)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2006/8 Sept-Sept, Wallsend, Segedunum Roman Fort & Baths Museum, Egypt Revealed 2009 May-present, Newcastle, Great North Museum, LT Loan Ancient Egypt British Museum Partnership Gallery
